text: Daou舌尖用力顶在男孩的敏感点上死命舔弄，打着圈描绘着那处软肉，Offroad尖叫着挺动双臀，有力的腰肢疯狂摇摆，在男人的嘴上追求高潮，不一会儿又一股浓稠的精液射出，落在男人的头顶，原本就汗湿的头发 更加凌乱不堪，Offroad还能感受到男人的舌头不断舔过自己的会阴和穴口，让他止不住发抖。
trans: Daou used the tip of his tongue to lick the boy's sensitive spot with all this strength, circling and drawing the soft flesh. Offroad screamed and thrust his hips, his powerful waist swaying wildly, pursuing climax on the man's mouth. Soon another thick stream of semen shot out and landed on top of the man's head, making his already sweaty hair even more messy. Offroad could also feel the man's tongue licking his perineum and hole, making him tremble uncontrollably.
